<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/user/{username}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This can only be done by the logged in user.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"username","in":"path","description":"The name that needs to be deleted","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
